title: 261: Jack Carr is a Tomahawk Kinda Guy
itunes:title: Jack Carr is a Tomahawk Kinda Guy
description: Former Navy SEAL and bestselling author, Jack Carr talks writing, grit, and how his desire to “never miss an opportunity to make someone’s day” led to the serendipitous circumstances that got his first novel into the hands of Chris Pratt.
itunes:author: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
dc:creator: The Way I Heard It with Mike Rowe
